document_data.name: Ariana Riverlost
document_data.mainbody: '''Ariana Riverlost''' was a wizard member of the [[Harpers]] in the [[Dessarin Valley]] during the [[Elemental Evil]] crisis.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]], Ariana and her two [[half-elven]] scout companions [[Elifar]] and [[Lorendil]] were sent to the [[Halls of the Hunting Axe]] in order to stop [[Gargosh Blusterhelm]] from reclaiming the legendary axe ''[[Orcsplitter]]''.
